name: The 10th edition of Zambia International Mining and Energy Conference and Exhibition : ZIMEC 2020
content: Following its great success during the last decade, the 10th edition of Zambia International Mining and Energy Conference and Exhibition is confirmed for 24 – 25 November 2020 at the Garden Court Hotel, Kitwe, Zambia. ZIMEC 2020 remains dedicated to providing the audience latest information on developments within the sectors, highlighting new opportunities and providing a platform for public and private sector players to network. It will bring together the most influential industry players to share their experience and knowledge during the 2-day conference. Our successful and expert speakers provide the latest industry updates and discuss current challenges and opportunities with regards to Zambia and surrounding countries. All attendees will play a role in stimulating Zambia’s mining and energy industries for economic growth.
